name: 7 Days in Dream 光尘
description: 梦一场，爱一生 梦与现实间的7天里，真相与隐情逐渐浮出水面，再一次鼓起勇气拥抱爱！
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space
